title: Teemo unavailable
body: I noticed today when I played ranked that Teemo was unavailable. My friends told me also that during the champion selection, in ranked games, they can't see or pick Teemo. Has anybody else noticed the problem?

replies.body: Teemo is currently disabled while an issue is being resolved.  Be sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for news and issues in real-time.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Please rush, im a teemo main and I decided not to play LoL because of this..
the day he got disabled i got home from work and was like, time to go play Teemo, and nope still not available
I now play soraka whenever i get top to heal the wounds left by me not being able to play our sweet prince Teemo
I'm still pretty salty because apparently I don't know how to play league without teemo ;P
